levels.title: Presenting
levels.description: With **only two spots available**, a presenting sponsorship nets the two organizations the most visibility! Presenting Sponsors are showcased with top billing, and Toast To Equality will be marketed as Toast To Equality Presented by **YOUR ORGANIZATION**.

levels.title: Supporting
levels.description: Supporting sponsorships help make Toast To Equality possible. Supporting sponsors receive heavy promotion during the lead up to the event and during Toast To Equality itself!

levels.title: Commemorative Bag
levels.description: There's just **one opportunity** to be the commemorative bag sponsor of Toast To Equality! Your organization's logo is featured on the tote bag received by all attendees!

levels.title: VIP Paradise
levels.description: New to 2019, there is just **one opportunity** for your organization to be the Toast To Equality VIP Paradise sponsor! Your logo is featured on the entrance banner to the VIP Paradise and visible to all attendees!

levels.title: Wristband
levels.description: Be the official wristband sponsor of Toast To Equality. There is just one opportunity to have your logo placed on the wristband of all attendees entering the event!

levels.title: Volunteer Shirt
levels.description: Here is your chance to have your organization seen throughout the entire event! This one opportunity lets you place your logo on the back of the Toast To Volunteers tshirt worn by all of our fantastic volunteers!

levels.title: Promoting
levels.description: Become a promoting sponsor and get in on the fun! Your organization is promoted in all of our print advertising and email blasts leading up to the event.

levels.title: Partnering
levels.description: Join us in a Toast To Equality as a partnering sponsor! Show your support for our mission while enjoying a few cocktails!
